front.title: Operational Security Requirements for IP Network Infrastructure: Advanced Requirements

abstract.t: This document defines a list of operational security requirements forthe infrastructure of large IP networks (such as routers andswitches). The goals of this document are to serve as a collectionof ideas for security features that would improve operationalsecurity and to assist consumers of network equipment incommunicating their security requirements to vendors. Therequirements in this document are NOT considered to be best currentpractice (BCP). Comments to:
